title: What are the Hindi songs that describe a girl? - Quora

response.answer_text: Desi Girl – Dostana (The Desi Kudis)Party on my mind – Race 2 (The Party Animals)Banno – Tanu Weds Manu Returns (The Swaggers)Patakha Guddi – Highway (The Adventurous)Lat Lag Gayee – Race 2 (Miss Possessive)Pretty Woman- Kal Hoo Naa Ho (The Nerds)O Womaniya-Gangs of Wasseypur (The Feminists)Masakali – Delhi 6 (The Carefree Ones)Chhaliya – Tashan (The Playgirls)Aali Re – No One Killed Jessica (The badass)Gulabi Aankhen – Student of The Year Version (Miss Fashionista)Drama Queen – Hasee Toh PhaseeJiya Re – Jab Tak Hai Jaan

There are no two alike women in this world. However, categorization is sometimes useful and fun too! And dedicating a song to each category makes this even more amazing! JIYA RE – The Tomboys :DRAMA QUEEN – The name says it all :GULABI ANKHEEN (SOTY Version) – Miss Fashionista :AALI RE – The badass :CHALLIYA – The Playgirls :MASAKALLI – The Carefree Ones :O WOMANIYA- The Feminists :
